format: html

## 🧭 Objective:  
Explore how conflict shapes long-term institutional development.

## ✍️ Prompt:  
Do post-conflict institutions converge or diverge over time? What factors influence these trajectories?

## 📥 Load Data
```{r}
legacy <- read_csv("assets/datasets/institutional_legacies.csv")
legacy %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = institutional_quality, color = country)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Institutional Quality Over Time",
       x = "Year", y = "Quality Index") +
  theme_minimal()
```
